titleStmt.title: The effect of certaine branches of the statute made in anno 33 Henrici viij touching the maintenance of artillery, and the punishment of such as vse vnlawfull games, very necessary to be put in execution
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Extract from original text of statute.
